entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with periods of snow this morning and with periods of freezing rain this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 9 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
